patents.title: Metformin compositions and methods
patents.claims_summary: General compositions and dosing for metabolic disorders.
patents.relevance: General metabolic use; no specific oncology claims.

patents.title: Metformin derivatives for cancer therapy
patents.claims_summary: Modified biguanide derivatives with enhanced uptake in tumor cells.
patents.relevance: Derivative compounds; not covering plain metformin.

patents.title: Aspirin formulations for cardiovascular protection
patents.claims_summary: Enteric-coated aspirin compositions for extended release and reduced GI side effects.
patents.relevance: Covers specific formulations but not basic aspirin use.

patents.title: Low-dose aspirin for cancer prevention
patents.claims_summary: Methods of using low-dose aspirin for reducing colorectal cancer risk.
patents.relevance: Specific cancer prevention claims; potential blocking patent.

patents.title: Sildenafil citrate compositions
patents.claims_summary: Basic sildenafil citrate formulations and methods of use for erectile dysfunction.
patents.relevance: Original composition patents expired; generic entry possible.

patents.title: Sildenafil for pulmonary arterial hypertension treatment
patents.claims_summary: Methods of treating PAH with sildenafil, specific dosing regimens.
patents.relevance: Active patents covering PAH indication; strong IP protection.

patents.title: Thalidomide analogs for immunomodulation
patents.claims_summary: Novel thalidomide analogs with improved safety profiles for cancer treatment.
patents.relevance: Covers derivative compounds; original thalidomide patents expired.

patents.title: Hydroxychloroquine combination therapies
patents.claims_summary: Combination of hydroxychloroquine with biologics for autoimmune diseases.
patents.relevance: Combination therapy patents; basic HCQ use remains open.

patents.title: Minoxidil topical formulations
patents.claims_summary: Topical minoxidil solutions and methods for treating androgenetic alopecia.
patents.relevance: Basic patents expired; generic formulations widely available.

patents.title: Enhanced minoxidil delivery systems
patents.claims_summary: Novel delivery systems for improved minoxidil penetration and efficacy.
patents.relevance: Formulation patents; basic minoxidil use remains unpatented.
